localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: We're excited to present a nice update of Bobby, the iPhone app that helps you keep track of your subscriptions. One of the often requested feature has now been added; Categories! You can now group subscriptions to categories in Bobby like Personal and Work.
blogPost.body: We're excited to present a nice update of Bobby, the iPhone app that helps you keep track of your subscriptions. One of the often requested feature has now been added; Categories! You can now group subscriptions to categories in Bobby like Personal and Work.
blogPost.title: Bobby 3.5 - Keep track of your subscriptions, now with categories
blogPost.author: Vince Schwidder

localize.description: 我们很高兴为您介绍Bobby的一个很好的更新，这个iPhone应用可以帮助您跟踪您的订阅情况。其中一个经常被要求的功能现在已经被添加了；分类！你现在可以在Bobby中把订阅的内容按照类别进行分组，比如说，你可以把订阅的内容按照类别进行分类。你现在可以在Bobby中对订阅进行分类，比如个人和工作。
localize.tagline: 跟踪您的订阅，现在有了分类。

localize.description: 我們很高興爲您介紹Bobby的一個很好的更新，這個iPhone應用可以幫助您跟蹤您的訂閱情況。其中一個經常被要求的功能現在已經被添加了；分類！你現在可以在Bobby中把訂閱的內容按照類別進行分組，比如說，你可以把訂閱的內容按照類別進行分類。你現在可以在Bobby中對訂閱進行分類，比如個人和工作。
localize.tagline: 跟蹤您的訂閱，現在有了分類。

previous.title:
I'm still struggling to understand how a $10 billion family office was running their portfolio like an 18 year old YOLO trader using infinite leverage on Robinhood

It's shocking how often the "smart" money can be so dumb

localize.full_text:
我仍在努力理解一个100亿美元的家族办公室是如何像一个18岁的YOLO交易员一样，利用Robinhood的无限杠杆来管理他们的投资组合的。

令人震惊的是，"聪明 "的资金往往会如此蠢蠢欲动

我仍在努力理解一個100億美元的家族辦公室是如何像一個18歲的YOLO交易員一樣，利用Robinhood的無限槓桿來管理他們的投資組合的。

令人震驚的是，"聰明 "的資金往往會如此蠢蠢欲動
